welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yate, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its beautiful green spaces and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that Yate has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gloucestershire Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gloucestershire Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
